scripts.check: npm run type-check && npm run lint
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf apps/*/node_modules && rm -rf packages/*/node_modules
scripts.infra:reset: docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml down -v && docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml up -d
scripts.db:connect: docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec postgres psql -U postgres -d boilerplate_db
scripts.db:reset: docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec postgres psql -U postgres -d boilerplate_db -c 'DROP SCHEMA public CASCADE; CREATE SCHEMA public;' && docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec postgres psql -U postgres -d boilerplate_db -f /docker-entrypoint-initdb.d/01-schema.sql && docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec postgres psql -U postgres -d boilerplate_db -f /docker-entrypoint-initdb.d/02-seed.sql
scripts.db:seed: docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec postgres psql -U postgres -d boilerplate_db -f /docker-entrypoint-initdb.d/02-seed.sql
scripts.db:clean: docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec postgres psql -U postgres -d boilerplate_db -c 'TRUNCATE TABLE agent_runs, tasks, agents, users, workspaces RESTART IDENTITY CASCADE;'
